properties.description: Ground Laurelhurst Market beef patty on brioche, with shaved char siu pork, spicy Chinese mustard, and crunchy Asian pickles.
properties.name: Char Siu Burger

properties.description: Tender Alessio bun, griddled onions, beef patty, thick cheddar, ketchup. Boom. The stone classic archetype.
properties.name: State Fair Burger

properties.description: Classic American cheese cheeseburger, special sauce, sesame seed bun, lettuce, onion, pickle, tomato.. No thrills, just good eats. Make it a double or even triple if you like, and add on a can of Couch Lager for $2, a shot of Beam for $3.
properties.name: Classic Cheeseburger

properties.description: Painted Hills ground chuck, bacon, smoked Gouda, lettuce, tomato-bacon jam, & topped with an onion ring.
properties.name: Shadow Burger

properties.description: Painted Hills ground chuck, southern pimento cheese, fried jalapeños, tender bacon.
properties.name: Burnin' Love Burger

properties.description: Candied bacon, mozzarella cheese, smoked and candied jalapeño aioli, shredded iceberg, 6oz hand-formed Wagyu patty, Portland French Bakery bun.
properties.name: Spicy Candied Bacon Cheeseburger / Burger DFX

properties.description: 1/4-lb beef patty with American cheese, pepperjack cheese, fat and tender bacon, sharp house pickles, and crisp, raw, white onion.
properties.name: Pepperjack Bacon Burger

properties.description: Housemade focaccia, house-cured pork belly, house pickles, tomato jam, fresh aioli, and a char-grilled Nicky USA venison patty. Available after 3pm every day.
properties.hours: Mon-Wed 3pm-11pm, Thurs-Fri 3pm-12am, Sat 10am-12am, Sun 10am-11pm (offer begins at 3pm)
properties.name: Venison Focaccia Burger

properties.description: Chorizo patty on brioche bun with refried black beans, guacamole, pickled red onions, especial sauce, and bacon-wrapped Hatch chile relleno. Offer begins at 2pm each day. Available at downtown location ONLY!
properties.hours: Mon-Thurs 11am-9pm, Fri 11am-10pm, Sat Noon-10pm (offer begins at 2pm)
properties.name: Sonoran Chile Relleno Burger

properties.description: Painted Hills 6oz hand-formed patty (cooked rare or to order and drizzled with brown butter), stuffed with Wisconsin cheese curds, on brown-butter-griddled housemade brioche bun. Topped with garlicky housemade kimchi aioli.
properties.name: Stuffed Cheese Curd Burger

properties.description: Hand-formed fresh beef patty, with extra-sharp white cheddar and all the classic trimmings, on a fresh potato bun.
properties.name: The Rialto Cheeseburger

properties.description: Ground buffalo patty w/Robyn's signature seasoning blend, peppered bacon, roasted red peppers, smoked Gouda cheese, tomato, a thick slab of white onion, pickles, on a Portland French Bakery brioche bun.
properties.name: Buffalo Burger

properties.description: Pickled daikon and carrot, fresh jalapeño, cilantro, Sriracha mayo,Grand Central brioche bun, thick Painted Hills beef patty.
properties.name: Banh Mi Burger

properties.description: Pickled daikon and carrot, fresh jalapeño, cilantro, Sriracha mayo,Grand Central brioche bun, thick Painted Hills beef patty.
properties.name: Banh Mi Burger

properties.description: Fresh ground beef griddled in bacon fat, potato bun, Swiss cheese, tomato, shredded iceberg, shiso, cilantro, crispy fried shallot, sweet chili-ginger special mayonnaise.
properties.name: The Smallwares Cheeseburger

properties.description: Housemade veggie patty (black bean, roasted red pepper, spinach, quinoa), roasted red pepper aioli, served on a whole wheat bun.
properties.name: Housemade Veggie Burger

properties.description: One all-beef patty, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickle, and onion on a sesame-seed bun.
properties.name: Outlaw Burger

properties.description: Locally sourced natural chuck patty, American cheese, hand-carved pork belly, fried onions/peppers and a tasty house recipe sweet pepper & dill yogurt sauce, all perfectly nestled on one of Tilt's giant, house recipe fresh baked biscuits. Burger Available after 8am.
properties.name: Eastern Block

properties.description: Locally sourced natural chuck patty, American cheese, hand-carved pork belly, fried onions/peppers and a tasty house recipe sweet pepper & dill yogurt sauce, all perfectly nestled on one of Tilt's giant, house recipe fresh baked biscuits.
properties.name: Eastern Block

properties.description: House veggie patty (garlic, almonds, brown sugar, red miso, kosher salt, black pepper, peanut butter, wakame, hazelnuts, quinoa, beets, potato starch, white onion, olive oil), served on a toasted bun with Misonaise, Heidi Ho Monterey Jack, carrot ramps and pea shoots.
properties.name: White Owl Social Club Hazelnut Beet Burger

properties.description: 6 oz Snake river farms American Kobe beef, American cheese, grilled pickled onion, iceberg slaw, fennel-tomato ketchup, grand central potato bun. Offer begins at 2pm each day.
properties.name: American Kobe Cheeseburger
